Mission.Name: Assault
Mission.GameSetup: The Defender designate one map edge as their home edge. The Attacker then chooses 2 other map edges to enter from, designating one as their home edge.

PlayerBriefing.Briefing: Attacker may use up to 75% of the player's total force. The Attacker selects 75% of its deployed force to enter from one of the two map edges selected as a part of game setup. The remaining portion of the Attacker's force enters from the other map edge between turns 4 and 12 as long as one attacking unit remains operational on the battlefield.

OpponentBriefing.Briefing: The Defender begins the track with all units in the playing area. No unit may be within 8 hexes of either of the Attacker's chosen map edges.

Option.Name: Complicated Weather
Option.Notes: Roll once on the General Weather Table (TO-pg 69) and apply the result to the battlefield

Objective.Name: Hammer
Objective.Description: Cripple/Destroy at least 65% of the Defender's force.

SpecialRule.Name: Commander
SpecialRule.Description: Use the 'Commander' rules for the Defender.

SpecialRule.Name: Salvage
SpecialRule.Description: The 'Salvage' rule only applies if the 'Hammer' objective is achieved.

Mission.Name: Beachhead (Attacker)
Mission.Description: Beachhead mission where the player is the Attacker
Mission.GameSetup: The Defender designate one map edge as their home edge. The Attacker's home edge is then the opposite edge.

PlayerBriefing.Briefing: Attacker may use up to 50% of the player's total force. The Attacker divides their force in half. One portion enters the track from the designated home edge at the start of the battle. The remaining portion enters from the same edge any turn between turns 5 and 10, as long as at least one operational Attacker unit remains on the battlefield. The Attacker must declare when their remaining force is entering during an End Phase. The force arrives in the Initiative Phase of the following turn (i.e. one full turn must pass between the declaration and the arrival).

OpponentBriefing.Briefing: The Defender begins the track with all units in the playing area and can be no further than 4 hexes from their designated home edge.

Option.Name: Complicated Weather
Option.Notes: Roll once on the General Weather Table (TO-pg 69) and apply the result to the battlefield

Option.Name: Sensor Interference
Option.Notes: Use the electromagnetic interference rules (see pg.55, TO)

Objective.Name: Hammer
Objective.Description: Cripple/Destroy at least 65% of the Defender's force.

Objective.Name: Breakthrough
Objective.Description: The player exits at least 25% of their force off the opponent's home edge.

SpecialRule.Name: Forced Withdrawal
SpecialRule.Description: The defender follows the 'Forced Withdrawal' rules (see pg.258, TW).

SpecialRule.Name: Salvage
SpecialRule.Description: The 'Salvage' rule only applies if the 'Hammer' objective is achieved.
